ack.p: We would like to thank the many Allegheny College students who have helped with the collection of annual census data, including Erika Bilger, Nicole Mason, Sara Maddie, Shelby Angelo, Landon Hanna, Mark Burkhart, Jared Balik, Susan Washko, Joanna Berry, Olivia Heeb, Nate Sellers, Cameron Eddy, and student class time donated by Casey Bradshaw-Wilson and Matt Venesky. Finally, we thank Howard Whiteman and two anonymous reviewers who provided constructive comments on earlier drafts that improved the quality of this manuscript.
